mainText:
The first thing I can think of is his legacy, not only for the great
organization he founded and lead, but for human kind. Its History and its
future.
Yes, that deep.
He took us all beyond our down to earth expectations, developing artifacts
that came from dreams and images of the future.
He took us to the 21st century. No keys to type. No mouses to grab and move.
Just our bare hands.

Thank you.
author: Ricardo
